review_content: Cloudy. Pretty big head. Lots of coriander and orange aromatics.  Sweetish, malty, lots of orange taste. Decent wit, nothing wrong with it. Apparently modeled after blanche de brooklyn.

139 THB from Siam Paragon, Thailand light and medium carbonation also with orange peel with bitter from hops. 

Not bad and suitable for beginners.

A small can from Jason's near NCCU, drunk at home several days ago. Aroma: unpleasant, unwashed socks. Appearance: opaque honey amber, 5 mm. bubbly head. Palate: light-bodied and slick, average carbonation, predominantly sweet at the finish. Taste: lightly sweet and bitter, not particularly well-balanced; plenty of vanilla. It tastes alright, but I found the smell a bit off-putting.

감귤향과 함께 밀맥주치고는 굉장히가벼워 여느음식과함께마셔도 좋다는게 장점. 
할인행사할때가 아니면.. 3천원 중반의가격이니.. 늘 경쟁에서밀린다.
동네편의점에서도 살 수있는것도 장점
16 ounce can after a long day at the DMZ. Pours a mostly clear orange hue with a large white head. A nice sweet fruity nose. Oranges, toast, pretty vibrant fruit. Solid. Light yeast.
Aromat typowo witbierowy. W smaku pomarańcza bardzo wyraźna. Ogólnie przyzwoite, tylko goryczka trochę nieprzyjemna.
on tap@cali pizza kitchen Seoul Korea 2019.04.05 外观 淡杏色半雾状酒身 少量惨白颗粒泡沫 香气 丁香 橙皮 香菜籽 味道 依旧是香菜籽 橙皮 松针 略单薄 回味 初期真空 之后些许松针 橙皮的苦 口感 酒体轻薄 沙口感中等 轻微刺痛感 涩感轻微 酒精感无 546312 3.0

overly translucent for the style, failure of yeast aromas. taste is very bland for the style and reliant on one-dimensional tangerine taste. the ingredients in korean say "orange zest". if this is a beer from jeju i assume they mean hallabong or a variety of tangerine, unless they are using foreign orange zest, in which case this has nothing to do with jeju island. very bland and watery with a macro feel but "craft" price.
From a bottle at the Inchon airport Foodies Pub. Pours a hazy gold with a white head. Aromas of cloves and bananas. Flavors are bitter and sweet. Fairly effervescent. Crispy finish.

Can 500ml. @ [ (PBF XII Tasting.) by oh6gdx ] - Petalax, Finland.

 [ As Jeju Wit Ale ].
Unclear - hazy matt light to medium yellow colour with a small to average, frothy - fizzy, fair lacing, mostly diminishing, white head. Aroma is moderate malty, wheat, light citrus, moderate yeasty, fruity yeast, witbier yeast, light coriander. Flavor is moderate sweet with a average duration, fruity yeast, witbier yeast, wheat, spicy, light coriander. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20180706]

 5-2-5-3-11

Sampled from a bottle in Jeju. Hazy golden colour with a white head. Little aroma and flavour is yeasty, with notes of lemon and wheat. Perhaps a hint is spice, but not much of the characteristic banana and coriander flavours associated with a witbier. Still, it is much better than all the other regular Korean beers,so it makes a pleasant change.
Can 500ml in pbf xii. Hazy yellow colour, small white head. Lame coriander, fruity aroma. Light-bodied. Pale malts, coriander in the flavour. Balanced ok with her.

50cl can. PBF XII.
Poured hazy golden color with a thin white head.
Sweet floral, mild spicy aroma. Some coriander and wheat later on. Basic wit without any surprises. Bit light.
Canned at PBF XII.  Cloudy yellow, small head. Aroma of tangerine and coriander. Mid sweet with light-medium body and clean, rounded mouthfeel. Tangerine and white bread. Low bitterness.

(Can) Pours hazy yellow with thin white head. Aroma has a dominant funkiness with some citrus notes. Light body with nice carbonation. Good taste; starts off refreshing and tart, develops some peppery spice notes and banana hints, followed by some nice breads flavours. Very drinkable, although aroma a little off-putting.
Cloudy. Pretty big head. Lots of coriander and orange aromatics.  Sweetish, malty, lots of orange taste. Decent wit, nothing wrong with it. Apparently modeled after blanche de brooklyn.
139 THB from Siam Paragon, Thailand light and medium carbonation also with orange peel with bitter from hops.…

A small can from Jason's near NCCU, drunk at home several days ago. Aroma: unpleasant, unwashed socks. Appearance: opaque honey amber, 5 mm. bubbly head. Palate: light-bodied and slick, average carbonation, predominantly sweet at the finish.…

감귤향과 함께 밀맥주치고는 굉장히가벼워 여느음식과함께마셔도 좋다는게 장점. 
할인행사할때가 아니면.. 3천원 중반의가격이니.. 늘 경쟁에서밀린다.
